text:

"l" stands for "Liter" (liter)
"S/Sprüdel" means "still/sparkling"

ALLERGY INFORMATION

A. Contains gluten-containing grains or products made from them

A.1 Wheat
A.2 Rye
A.3 Barley
A.4 Oats
A.5 Spelt
A.6 Kamut
B. Contains crustaceans or products thereof

C. Contains eggs or products thereof

D. Contains fish or products thereof

E. Contains peanuts or products thereof

F. Contains soybeans or products thereof

G. Contains milk or products thereof (including lactose)

G.1 Milk
G.2 Lactose
H. Contains nuts

H.1 Almonds
H.2 Hazelnuts
H.3 Walnuts
H.4 Cashew nuts
K. Contains sesame seeds or products thereof

1. Contains dyes

1.1 - can affect activity and attention in children
2. Contains preservatives

4. Contains Nitrates

5. Contains Nitrite curing salt and nitrate

6. Contains antioxidants

7. Contains flavor enhancers

8. Sulfurized

13. Contains sweeteners

14. Contains a source of phenylalanine

15. Contains caffeine

15.1 - High caffeine content, not recommended for children and pregnant or breastfeeding women
16. Contains quinine

18. Contains acidity regulators

19. Contains sulfites

20. Contains protein

21. Contains milk protein

22. Contains starch

23. Contains egg white

24. Contains protein (from eggs)

Starters - Vorspeisen

Samosa, 2 pcs (A1, G, H4) €5.50: Deep-fried triangular pastries filled with spiced potatoes and peas. Contains wheat, gluten, milk, and nuts.
Onion Pakora (A1, G, H4) €5.50: Deep-fried onion rings in a chickpea batter. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Papad (A1, G) €2.00: Thin, crispy lentil wafers. Contains wheat and gluten.
Masala Papad (A1, G, H4) €2.90: Papad seasoned with spices. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Raita (G, H4) €3.50: Yogurt-based dip with cucumber and spices. Contains milk.
Vada Pav (A1, G, H4) €8.00: A popular Indian street food made with a potato fritter served in a bread roll. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Paneer Pakora (A1, G, H4) €5.90: Deep-fried cottage cheese fritters. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Chicken Pakora (G, H4) €6.50: Deep-fried chicken pieces in a chickpea batter. Contains milk.
Chana Chat (G, H4) €5.50: A spicy and tangy chickpea salad with tomatoes, onions, and cilantro. Contains milk.
Chicken Chana Chat (G, H4) €6.50: Chicken with chickpeas, tomatoes, onions, and cilantro. Contains milk.
Soup - Suppen

Tomato Soup (G) €5.50: Tomato soup with fresh coriander. Contains milk.
Daal Soup (G, H4) €5.50: Lentil soup with fresh coriander. Contains milk.
Chicken Soup (G, H4) €6.50: Chicken soup with coriander. Contains milk.
Veg Manchow Soup (G, H4) €5.50: Spicy vegetable soup with soy sauce and spring onions. Contains milk.
Chicken Manchow Soup (G, H4) €5.50: Spicy chicken soup with soy sauce and spring onions. Contains milk.
Salad - Salate

Salad with French/Yogurt Dressing (A1, G, H4) €5.50: Large mixed salad with French or yogurt dressing. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Swaad Veg Salad (with Mushroom) with French/Yogurt Dressing (A1, G, H4, HS) €7.90: Large mixed salad with mushrooms and French or yogurt dressing. Contains wheat, gluten, milk, and nuts.
Swaad Chicken Salad with French/Yogurt Dressing (A1, G, H4, HS) €8.90: Grilled chicken breast strips, onions, with French or yogurt dressing. Contains wheat, gluten, milk, and nuts.
Main Course - Hauptgericht

Vegetarian Speciality - Vegetarische Spezialitäten

Chana Masala (G, H4) €12.50: Chickpea curry with fresh tomatoes and ginger. Contains milk.
Daal Makhani (G, H4) €11.90: Creamy lentil dish cooked with butter and cream. Contains milk.
Daal Tadka (G) €11.90: Yellow lentils tempered with spices. Contains milk.
Paneer Butter Masala (G, H4) €12.50: Cottage cheese cubes cooked in a creamy tomato and butter sauce. Contains milk.
Kadai Paneer (G, H4) €12.50: Cottage cheese cooked with onions, peppers, and spices. Contains milk.
Matar Paneer (G, H4) €12.50: Cottage cheese cooked with peas. Contains milk.
Alu Gobi Masala (G, H4) €12.50: Potatoes and cauliflower cooked in a spicy masala sauce. Contains milk.
Palak Paneer (G, H4) €12.50: Cottage cheese cooked with spinach. Contains milk.
Shahi Baigan (G, H4) €12.50: Eggplant cooked in a rich, creamy sauce. Contains milk.
Baigan Bharta (G, H4) €12.50: Mashed eggplant cooked with spices. Contains milk.
Mix Veg (G, H4) €12.50: Mixed vegetables cooked in a masala sauce. Contains milk.
Please note:

(A1) - Contains wheat
(G) - Contains gluten
(H4) - Contains milk
(HS) - Contains nuts

Vegetarian Speciality - Vegetarische Spezialitäten

Veg Jalfreji (G, H4) €12.50: Vegetables cooked in a spicy and tangy sauce with onions, tomatoes, peppers, ginger, and coriander. Contains gluten and milk.
Veg Kofta (G, H4) €12.50: Vegetable dumplings cooked in a spicy curry sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Matar Paneer (G, H4) €12.50: Cottage cheese cooked with peas in a creamy tomato sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Maharashtrian Vegetarian Speciality - Vegetarische Spezialitäten aus Maharashtra

Bharli Vangi (G, H4) €19.50: Stuffed eggplant with groundnuts and spices, cooked in Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Pithla (G, H4) €12.50: Split pigeon peas cooked with spices, coriander, and green chilies, in Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Shev Bhaji (G, H4) €19.50: Spicy flat rice noodles dish with vegetables, in Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Matki Chi Usal (G, H4) €12.50: Matki beans (horse gram) cooked with spices, in Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Non Vegetarian Speciality - Fleisch Spezialitäten

Kadai Chicken (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked with onions, peppers, and spices in a kadai (wok). Contains gluten and milk.
Butter Chicken (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked in a creamy tomato and butter sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Tikka Masala (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken tikka cooked in a creamy tomato and onion sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Jalfrezi (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked with peppers, onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Korma (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked in a creamy nut-based sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Vindaloo (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked in a spicy vinegar-based sauce with potatoes, ginger, and yogurt. Contains gluten and milk.
Mango Chicken (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked in a tangy mango sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Mutton Rogan Josh (G, H4) €15.50: Lamb cooked in a rich tomato and yogurt-based sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Nilgiri (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked with coriander leaves, coconut milk, green chilies, and mint. Contains gluten and milk.
Punjabi Chicken Curry (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked in a Punjabi-style curry with spices. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Palak (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked with spinach in a creamy sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Mutton Korma (G, H4) €15.50: Lamb cooked in a creamy nut-based sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Mutton Nilgiri (G, H4) €15.50: Lamb cooked with coriander leaves, coconut milk, green chilies, and mint. Contains gluten and milk.
Mango Mutton (G, H4) €15.50: Lamb cooked in a tangy mango sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
Bhuna Ghosht (G, H4) €15.50: Slow-cooked lamb with spices. Contains gluten and milk.
Mutton Vindaloo (G, H4) €15.50: Lamb cooked in a spicy vinegar-based sauce with potatoes, ginger, and yogurt. Contains gluten and milk.
Please note:

(G) - Contains gluten
(H4) - Contains milk

Maharashtrian Non Vegetarian Speciality - Fleisch Spezialitäten aus Maharashtra

Egg Curry (G, H4) €12.90: Eggs cooked in a spicy curry sauce, Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Kharda (H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked with spices, Maharashtrian style. Contains milk.
Chicken Kharda (H4) €13.50: (Duplicate entry)
Chicken Sukka (H4) €13.50: Chicken cooked in a dry, spicy sauce, Maharashtrian style. Contains milk.
Mutton Curry (G, H4) €15.50: Lamb curry, Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Mutton Kharda (H4) €15.50: Lamb cooked in a spicy sauce, Maharashtrian style. Contains milk.
Mutton Sukka (H4) €15.50: Lamb cooked in a dry, spicy sauce, Maharashtrian style. Contains milk.
Fish Masala (G, H4) €15.50: Fish cooked in a spicy masala sauce, Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Prawns Curry (G, H4) €18.50: Prawns cooked in a spicy curry sauce, Maharashtrian style. Contains gluten and milk.
Tandoori Khana - Tandoor-Spezialität

Paneer Tikka (G, H1) €13.50: Grilled cottage cheese cubes marinated with spices and onions from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Paneer Pudina Tikka (G, H1) €13.50: Grilled cottage cheese cubes marinated with mint yogurt sauce, spicy. Contains gluten and nuts.
Chicken Tikka (G, H1) €14.50: Grilled boneless chicken breast from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Chicken Hariyali Kabab (G, H1) €14.50: Grilled chicken breast marinated with coriander and mint leaves from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Chicken Achari Tikka (G, H1) €14.50: Grilled chicken marinated with lemon, chili, and ginger, spicy. Contains gluten and nuts.
Tandoori Chicken (G, H1) €14.50: Grilled chicken pieces from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Mutton Tikka (G, H1) €16.90: Grilled marinated lamb from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Fish Tikka (G, H1) €15.90: Grilled marinated fish from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Zhinga Tandoori (G, H1) €19.50: Grilled marinated prawns from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Mix Grill (G, H1) €17.50: A variety of grilled meats and vegetables from the tandoor oven. Contains gluten and nuts.
Biryani - Biryani Reis

Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani (Fri, Sat, Sun) (G, H4) €13.50: Chicken with bones cooked in a flavorful biryani rice, Hyderabad style. Served on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Contains gluten and milk.
Veg Biryani (G, C, H4) €11.50: Vegetable biryani with rice. Contains gluten, dairy, and milk.
Chicken Biryani (G, H4) €13.90: Chicken with or without bones in biryani rice. Contains gluten and milk.
Mutton Biryani (G, H4) €15.90: Lamb with or without bones in biryani rice. Contains gluten and milk.
Indo-Chinese - Indo-Chinesische Spezialität

Veg Manchurian (G) €10.90: Vegetable Manchurian - Indo-Chinese style vegetable dish. Contains gluten.
Gobi Manchurian (G) €10.90: Cauliflower Manchurian - Indo-Chinese style cauliflower dish. Contains gluten.
Paneer Manchurian (G, F, G9) €10.90: Cottage cheese Manchurian - Indo-Chinese style cottage cheese dish. Contains gluten, dairy, and egg.
Egg Fried Rice (C, F, G, E9) €10.90: Fried rice with egg. Contains dairy, egg, and gluten.
Please note:

(G) - Contains gluten
(H1) - Contains nuts
(H4) - Contains milk
(C) - Contains dairy
(F) - Contains egg
(E9) - Contains egg white

Indo-Chinese - Indo-Chinesische Spezialität

Veg Fried Rice (G, H2) €10.90: Fried rice with vegetables, soy sauce, and spring onions, in Indo-Chinese style. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Fried Rice (G, H2) €10.90: Fried rice with chicken, soy sauce, and spring onions, in Indo-Chinese style. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken 65 (G, H2) €10.90: Chicken marinated with besan flour, coriander leaves, and chili, cooked with vegetables in Indo-Chinese style. Contains gluten and milk.
Chicken Lollipop (G, H2) €10.90: Chicken lollipops (chicken wings) marinated in Indo-Chinese style. Contains gluten and milk.
Sides - Beilagen

Plain Roti (A1, G) €2.50: Plain whole wheat flatbread baked in the tandoor oven. Contains wheat and gluten.
Butter Roti (A1, G) €3.00: Butter-smeared whole wheat flatbread baked in the tandoor oven. Contains wheat and gluten.
Naan (A1, G) €3.00: Plain leavened flatbread baked in the tandoor oven. Contains wheat and gluten.
Butter Naan (A1, G) €3.50: Butter-smeared leavened flatbread baked in the tandoor oven. Contains wheat and gluten.
Garlic Naan (A1, G) €3.50: Garlic-flavored leavened flatbread baked in the tandoor oven. Contains wheat and gluten.
Chapati (A1, G) €2.50: Whole wheat flatbread (available on special days). Contains wheat and gluten.
Bhakri (A1) €3.50: Jowar (millet) flatbread, Maharashtrian style. (Available on special days). Contains wheat.
Basmati Rice Portion (A1) €3.00: Basmati rice. Contains wheat.
Jeera Rice Portion (A1) €2.50: Basmati rice with cumin seeds. Contains wheat.
Lachha Paratha (A1, G) €3.50: Flaky layered flatbread made with whole wheat flour. Contains wheat and gluten.
Veg Paratha (A1, G) €4.00: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with vegetables. Contains wheat and gluten.
Aloo Paratha (A1, G) €4.50: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with potatoes. Contains wheat and gluten.
Paneer Paratha (A1, G) €4.50: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with cottage cheese. Contains wheat and gluten.
Peshawari Naan (A1, G, H1, H4) €4.50: Naan bread filled with a mixture of raisins, almonds, and coconut, baked in the tandoor oven. Contains wheat, gluten, nuts, milk.
Chicken Khima Naan (A1, G) €4.90: Naan bread filled with chicken mince. Contains wheat and gluten.
Mutton Khima Naan (A1, G) €5.50: Naan bread filled with lamb mince. Contains wheat and gluten.
Ladoos (A1, G) €4.00: Indian sweet made with gram flour and sugar. Contains wheat and gluten.
HOMEMADE DESSERT - HAUSGEMACHTE NACHSPEISEN

Gulab Jamun (G, A1, H1, H4, H7) €3.50: Deep-fried milk dumplings soaked in sugar syrup. Contains wheat, gluten, milk, nuts.
Ras Malai (G, H1, H4, H7) €4.50: Flattened milk dumplings soaked in thickened milk flavored with cardamom. Contains gluten, milk, and nuts.
Gajar Halwa (G, H1, H4, H7) €4.50: Carrot pudding with milk, nuts, and raisins. Contains gluten, milk, and nuts.
Mango Cream (G, H1) €4.50: Mango cream with vanilla ice cream. Contains gluten and milk.
Sizzling Brownie (G, H1) €5.00: Brownie with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce. Contains gluten and milk.
CHAT JUNCTION

Pani Puri €5.00: Deep-fried puffed puri filled with potatoes, chickpeas, and spices.
Samosa Chaat (A1, G, H4) €6.00: Samosas broken into pieces and mixed with chickpeas, yogurt, and spices. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Papdi Chaat (A1, G, H4) €6.00: A crispy flatbread topped with potatoes, chickpeas, yogurt, and spices. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Dahi Puri (A1, G, H4) €6.00: Puri filled with potatoes, chickpeas, yogurt, and spices. Contains wheat, gluten, and milk.
Please note:

(A1) - Contains wheat
(G) - Contains gluten
(H1) - Contains nuts
(H2) - Contains milk
(H4) - Contains milk
(H7) - Contains nuts
name: Swaad
